newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Sons has control of Orion.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Sons has control of Orion.

text.p: Sons of Gwalia Ltd said on Wednesday it has control of takeover target and fellow Western Australian gold miner Orion Resources NL.
Sons of Gwalia is offering A$1.80 per Orion share and has already declared the bid unconditional.
It said it had received 8.661 million Orion shares from Australia and overseas investors. The miner said it was now entitled to 52.52 percent of Orion shares on a diluted basis.
The bid values Orion at about A$130 million.
Coeur d'Alene Mines Corp of the United States has a 19 percent stake in Orion.
Orion shares closed steady at A$1.80, while Sons of Gwalia shares closed 10 cents up at A$7.60. Orion has 72.26 million shares on issue. -- Sydney newsroom 61-2 9373 1800
